title: Scourge of the village
description:
A massacre that wiped out a village that has been left in the dust for more than ten years, a shuttle between reality and dreams. As Chen Xi returns to the ruined village , the truth of two seemingly unrelated cases is revealed. Été
In the game, players are forced to fall between reality and dreams. The puzzles incorporate a large number of traditional Chinese folklore elements, such as: Five Elements, Bagua, Yin and Yang, etc
Connect known clues and understand the plot and entries to affect scene changes by dragging, combining, and rotating text entries . Solve every puzzle in the game and uncover the truth.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD 7850
